start.text: You'd better make it worth it.

start_boss.text: Let's get our laughs while we can!

out_of_missiles.text: Hope you got room for more, I brough a full course meal!

engaged.text: You'd better make it worth it.

need_help.text: Looks like you made a friend of your own.

pursuing.text: Hey Tourists, having a little trouble?!
At least stay for dessert, tourists!

hull_90.text: You're a smart cookie aren't you?

hull_50.text: Is that all you've got?! Come on!
Times like this... I can't help but laugh!
